body:

I don't really know why I stopped because I had created everything I needed to have a website like this one. ",t(a.h2,{id:"what-next-",children:t(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#what-next-",children:"What Next ?"})}),"
